members.signatureBeforeChange: boolean setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean move, boolean resize)
members.signatureAfterChange: boolean setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean move, boolean resize)
diff: +	* Bug in Motif.  When a shell that is maximized is resized to
+	* the same size, when the shell is unmaximized, the origin of
+	* the shell is moved to (0, 0).  The fix is to detect this case
+	* NOTE: When only the size is changed, the shell moves to (0, 0).
+	* When only the location is changed, the shell is not moved.  There
+	* is no fix for these problems at this time.

members.signatureBeforeChange: int setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean move, boolean resize)
members.signatureAfterChange: int setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean move, boolean resize)
diff: +	* Bug in GTK.  When either of the location or size of
+	* a shell is changed while the shell is maximized, the
+	* shell is moved to (0, 0).  The fix is to explicitly
+	* unmaximize the shell before setting the bounds to
+	* anything different from the current bounds.
